title: Is it me  or the new client makes fps drops ?
body:
My pc is not that good but still..
with new client = 50 - 60 fps
Old one = 90 - 110 fps
wtf ?

replies.body:
Hmm... The new client doesn't really affect anything post-champ select, so it's unlikely to affect your FPS in a measurable way. There are a lot of things that impact framerate every day, which are mostly display drivers or windows power settings. Our [**FPS Troubleshooting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) should help you get your framerate under control, so I'd strongly recommend giving the outlined steps a try!

Let me know if this caused any change in your FPS.
